post.description:
To return image content, the Image URL must be as a POST request to the Industry API and version URL.

Example:
https://api.ibisworld.com/industry/v3/image/?country=us&code=11111&language=english&image=revenue

Analysis.example:
Average revenue per employee for businesses with 0-4 employees has increased in the last five years at an annualized rate of 7.9% to reach $408,921 per employee in 2023. This segment displays the highest revenue per employee among different business sizes in the Timber Services industry, and so appears to be the most efficient with their labor force.

Further, this segment has increased average revenue per employee at a faster rate than the industry average for the same period. This indicates that businesses with 0-4 employees are gaining efficiency at a faster rate than the average Timber Services operator.
